item.description: Our next afternoon meet up will be at Clear Conscience Cafe (Harvard CO-OP Market) in Central Square from 5:30-7:30 PM. Food and drinks available here. I wont be there if nobody RSVP yes. I will only wait 15 mins past the hour if some one RSVP yes, but not show up. ( sorry, consider some people RSVP yes, and never show up) Take the T to Central Square, www.mbta.com. For driving directions Click here.[url=http://chinese.meetup.com/35/pages/http%3A//maps.google.com/maps%3Ff%3Dl%26hl%3Den%26geocode%3D%26q%3Dclear+conscience+cafe%26near%3DCambridge%2C+MA%26ie%3DUTF8%26ll%3D42.364759%2C-71.102325%26spn%3D0.00...] Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday afternoon study group
